
# The Relationships Between Disorder, Abundance, Haploinsufficiency, and Phase Separation

### Project Information

This thesis was written by Alex Adrian-Hamazaki under the supervision of Dr. Jorg Gsponer and Dr. Erich Kueler.
It was completed on April 8th, 2022

### Informative Markdown Files

2 Markdown files which walk a user on the code is available:

<br>

**Bin_Genes.html**  outlines the method on binning the proteome by abundance and disorder
**Enrichment_Analysis.html** outlines the method on performing the enrichment analysis

The sources of the data utilized in this project can be found under the Methods section of the thesis.
